#summary Key maps for better understandability

==Examples==
===Some simple sentences typed using Phonetic and Inscript layout for Hindi===
  # PHONETIC
    * thumhArA nAm kyA hY?
      तुम्हारा नाम् क्या है? 
    * mErA BArath mahAn
      मेरा भारत् महान्|
  # INSCRIPT
    * lgc FOj EA
      तुम इधर आओ
    * Ojer iAn uw
      धरती गोल है

The same keyboard can be used to type Marathi also as Hindi & Marathi both use the Devanagari script. An example Marathi sentence is:
    * cje”r mahr Ye<e Eus
      मराठी सोपी भाषा आहे











-------------------
For popular layouts like KaGaPa, Remington and Tamil99, the "Show Current Layout" option can be used to view the keymap.

*The key map assignment can be changed dynamically by altering the xml files. Please see HowToChangeKeyMap wiki page for more information.*
